name: Cosmic Glob
overview: A one or two player shooter, published in A.N.A.L.O.G. Computing Magazine issue 48, November 1986, page 96. In the year 2500, a giant energy cluster heads toward the Earth. Fighters are sent to intercept; only one returns. Is this the end? The surviving fighter brings little hope. The media-christened Cosmic Glob, it seems, can only be destroyed by chunking it out and neutralizing its core. With the formation trapped in a weakening force field just short of the planet, you must destroy the horror before it destroys you — and the Earth.
